name: Forest Demo
description:
I started this in June 2020, worked on it for like 3 days then didn't touch it again for almost a year, worked on it again for like 2 or 3 weeks and then more life happened.
I tried working on it again and unity like just decided it didn't like this project anymore so im gonna start it over from scratch and make it into something more like an actual game hehe <3

the main focus of this is the day/night script i created and just the general vibe. the tree "textures" are all @dataerase and everything else is mine i made from scratch.

there's no sounds or goal or anything to this really, just a space to exist in.
it does feel nice that this is my first solo project since like 2016, and i lost that one to the ether sadly a long time ago.
